.
=-- inline words(left)
.
<p><span class="align-left align">inline words(left)</span></p>
.

.
-=- inline words(center)
.
<p><span class="align-center align">inline words(center)</span></p>
.

.
--= inline words(right)
.
<p><span class="align-right align">inline words(right)</span></p>
.

.
-=- # foobar
.
<p><span class="align-center align"># foobar</span></p>
.

.
# -=- foobar
.
<h1><span class="align-center align">foobar</span></h1>
.
